name: scratch3-internet
description: Some extensions to extend scratch 3's internet capability

scripts.setup:gui: cd scratch-gui && npm install && npm link scratch-vm && cd ..
scripts.setup:vm: cd scratch-vm && npm install && npm link && cd ..
scripts.setup: git submodule init && npm run setup:vm && npm run setup:gui && npm install shx
scripts.build:gui: cd scratch-gui && npm run build & cd ..
scripts.build: pwd && ls && npm run build:replace && npm run build:gui

author: Fred Lin
